subTraces.description: Using Enhanced Basic ATK restores the Trailblazer's HP by 5% of their Max HP.

traces.name: Action Beats Overthinking
traces.description: When the Trailblazer is protected by a Shield at the beginning of the turn, increases their ATK by 15% and regenerates 5 Energy until the action is over.
HP +4%

e1.name: Earth-Shaking Resonance
e1.description: When the Trailblazer uses their Basic ATK, additionally deals Fire DMG equal to 25% of the Trailblazer's DEF. When the Trailblazer uses their enhanced Basic ATK, additionally deals Fire DMG equal to 50% of the Trailblazer's DEF.

e2.name: Time-Defying Tenacity
e2.description: The Shield applied to all allies from the Trailblazer's Talent will block extra DMG equal to 2% of the Trailblazer's DEF plus 27.

e3.name: Trail-Blazing Blueprint
e3.description:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

e4.name: Nation-Building Oath
e4.description: At the start of the battle, immediately gains 4 stack(s) of Magma Will.

e5.name: Spirit-Warming Flame
e5.description:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

e6.name: City-Forging Bulwarks
e6.description: After the Trailblazer use enhanced Basic ATK or Ultimate, their DEF increases by 10%. Stacks up to 3 time(s).

description: A person who boarded the Astral Express. They chose to travel with the Astral Express to eliminate the dangers posed by the Stellaron.

voiceActors.jp: Junya Enoki (榎木 淳弥) / Yui Ishikawa (石川 由依)

name: Welt

attack.name: Gravity Suppression
attack.description:
[Single Target]
Deals Imaginary DMG equal to 50% of Welt's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Edge of the Void
skill.description:
[Bounce]
Deals Imaginary DMG equal to 36% of Welt's ATK to a single enemy and further deals DMG 2 extra times, with each time dealing Imaginary DMG equal to 36% of Welt's ATK to a random enemy. On hit, there is a 65% base chance to reduce the enemy's SPD by 10% for 2 turn(s).

ultimate.name: Synthetic Black Hole
ultimate.description:
[AoE] | Energy Cost: 120
Deals Imaginary DMG equal to 90% of Welt's ATK to all enemies, with a 100% base chance for enemies hit by this ability to be Imprisoned for 1 turn.
Imprisoned enemies have their actions delayed by 32% and SPD reduced by 10%.

talent.name: Time Distortion
talent.description:
[Enhance]
When hitting an enemy that is already Slowed, Welt deals Additional Imaginary DMG equal to 30% of his ATK to the enemy.

technique.name: Gravitational Imprisonment
technique.description:
[Impair]
After using Welt's Technique, create a dimension that lasts for 15 second(s). Enemies in this dimension have their Movement SPD reduced by 50%. After entering battle with enemies in the dimension, there is a 100% base chance to Imprison the enemies for 1 turn.
Imprisoned enemies have their actions delayed by 20% and SPD reduced by 10%. Only 1 dimension created by allies can exist at the same time.

traces.name: Retribution
traces.description: When using Ultimate, there is a 100% base chance to increase the DMG received by the targets by 12% for 2 turn(s).

traces.name: Judgment
traces.description: Using Ultimate additionally regenerates 10 Energy.

traces.name: Punishment
traces.description: Deals 20% more DMG to enemies inflicted with Weakness Break.
ATK +4%

e1.name: Legacy of Honor
e1.description: After Welt uses his Ultimate, his abilities are enhanced. The next 2 time(s) he uses his Basic ATK or Skill, deals Additional DMG to the target equal to 50% of his Basic ATK's DMG multiplier or 80% of his Skill's DMG multiplier respectively.

e2.name: Conflux of Stars
e2.description: When his Talent is triggered, Welt regenerates 3 Energy.

e3.name: Prayer of Peace
e3.description:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

e4.name: Appellation of Justice
e4.description: Base chance for Skill to inflict SPD Reduction increases by 35%.

e5.name: Power of Kindness
e5.description:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

e6.name: Prospect of Glory
e6.description: When using Skill, deals DMG for 1 extra time to a random enemy.

materials.bossMat: Golden Crown of the Past Shadow

description: A seasoned member of the Express crew. The passion buried in his heart burns anew as he enjoys this fresh adventure. Occasionally, he would sketch the experiences in a notebook.

name: Yanqing

attack.name: Frost Thorn
attack.description:
[Single Target]
Deals Ice DMG equal to 50% of Yanqing's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Darting Ironthorn
skill.description:
[Single Target]
Deals Ice DMG equal to 110% of Yanqing's ATK to a single enemy and activates Soulsteel Sync for 1 turn.

ultimate.name: Amidst the Raining Bliss
ultimate.description:
[Single Target] | Energy Cost: 140
Increases Yanqing's CRIT Rate by 60%. When Soulsteel Sync is active, increases Yanqing's CRIT DMG by an extra 30%. This buff lasts for one turn. Afterwards, deals Ice DMG equal to 210% of Yanqing's ATK to a single enemy.

talent.name: One With the Sword
talent.description:
[Single Target]
When Soulsteel Sync is active, Yanqing is less likely to be attacked by enemies. Yanqing's CRIT Rate increases by 15% and his CRIT DMG increases by 15%. After Yanqing attacks an enemy, there is a 50% fixed chance to perform a follow-up attack, dealing Ice DMG equal to 25% of Yanqing's ATK to the enemy, which has a 65% base chance to Freeze the enemy for 1 turn.
The Frozen target cannot take action and receives Additional Ice DMG equal to 25% of Yanqing's ATK at the beginning of each turn.
When Yanqing receives DMG, the Soulsteel Sync effect will disappear.

technique.name: The One True Sword
technique.description:
[Enhance]
After using his Technique, at the start of the next battle, Yanqing deals 30% more DMG for 2 turn(s) to enemies whose current HP is 50% or higher.

traces.name: Icing on the Kick
traces.description: When Yanqing attacks, deals Additional Ice DMG equal to 30% of Yanqing's ATK to enemies with Ice Weakness

traces.name: Frost Favors the Brave
traces.description: When Soulsteel Sync is active, Effect RES increases by 20%.

traces.name: Gentle Blade
traces.description: When a CRIT Hit is triggered, increases SPD by 10% for 2 turn(s).
ATK +4%
HP +4%
ATK +6%

e1.name: Svelte Saber
e1.description: When Yanqing attacks a Frozen enemy, he deals Additional Ice DMG equal to 60% of his ATK.

e2.name: Supine Serenade
e2.description: When Soulsteel Sync is active, Energy Regeneration Rate increases by an extra 10%.

e3.name: Sword Savant
e3.description:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

e4.name: Searing Sting
e4.description: When the current HP percentage is 80% or higher, Ice RES PEN increases by 12%.

e5.name: Surging Strife
e5.description:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

e6.name: Swift Swoop
e6.description: If the Ultimate's buffs are still in effect when an enemy is defeated, their duration is extended by 1 turn.

description: General Jing Yuan's retainer. A gifted swordsman who hasn't even come of age. No one can best Yanqing when he holds a sword in hand.

name: Seele

attack.name: Thwack
attack.description:
[Single Target]
Deals Quantum DMG equal to 50% of Seele's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Sheathed Blade
skill.description:
[Single Target]
Increases Seele's SPD by 25% for 2 turn(s) and deals Quantum DMG equal to 110% of Seele's ATK to a single enemy.

ultimate.name: Butterfly Flurry
ultimate.description:
[Single Target] | Energy Cost: 120
Seele enters the buffed state and deals Quantum DMG equal to 255% of her ATK to a single enemy.

talent.name: Resurgence
talent.description:
[Enhance]
Enters the buffed state upon defeating an enemy with Basic ATK, Skill, or Ultimate, and receives an extra turn. While in the buffed state, the DMG of Seele's attacks increases by 40% for 1 turn(s).
Enemies defeated in the extra turn provided by "Resurgence" will not trigger another "Resurgence."

technique.name: Phantom Illusion
technique.description:
[Enhance]
After using her Technique, Seele gains Stealth for 20 second(s). While Stealth is active, Seele cannot be detected by enemies. And when entering battle by attacking enemies, Seele will immediately enter the buffed state.

traces.name: Nightshade
traces.description: When current HP percentage is 50% or lower, reduces the chance of being attacked by enemies.

traces.name: Lacerate
traces.description: While Seele is in the buffed state, her Quantum RES PEN increases by 20%.

traces.name: Rippling Waves
traces.description: After using a Basic ATK, Seele's next action will be Advanced Forward by 20%.
ATK +4%
DEF +5%
ATK +6%

e1.name: Extirpating Slash
e1.description: When dealing DMG to an enemy whose HP percentage is 80% or lower, CRIT Rate increases by 15%.

e2.name: Dancing Butterfly
e2.description: The SPD Boost effect of Seele's Skill can stack up to 2 time(s).

e3.name: Dazzling Tumult
e3.description:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

e4.name: Flitting Phantasm
e4.description: Seele regenerates 15 Energy when she defeats an enemy.

e5.name: Piercing Shards
e5.description:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

e6.name: Shattering Shambles
e6.description:
After Seele uses her Ultimate, inflict the target enemy with Butterfly Flurry for 1 turn(s). Enemies suffering from Butterfly Flurry will take Additional Quantum DMG equal to 15% of Seele's Ultimate DMG every time they are attacked. If the target enemy is defeated by the Butterfly Flurry DMG triggered by other allies' attacks, Seele's Talent will not be triggered.
When Seele is knocked down, the Butterfly Flurry inflicted on the enemies will be removed.

description: A resident of the Underworld and the backbone of Wildfire. She goes by the alias "Babochka." She has a frank personality, but there is a delicate and sensitive hidden side to her deep in her heart.

name: Jing Yuan

attack.name: Glistening Light
attack.description:
[Single Target]
Deals Lightning DMG equal to 50% of Jing Yuan's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Rifting Zenith
skill.description:
[AoE]
Deals Lightning DMG equal to 50% of Jing Yuan's ATK to all enemies and increases Lightning-Lord's Hits Per Action by 2 for the next turn.

ultimate.name: Lightbringer
ultimate.description:
[AoE] | Energy Cost: 130
Deals Lightning DMG equal to 120% of Jing Yuan's ATK to all enemies and increases Lightning-Lord's Hits Per Action by 3 for the next turn.

talent.name: Prana Extirpated
talent.description:
[Bounce]
Summons Lightning-Lord at the start of the battle. Lightning-Lord has 60 base SPD and 3 base Hits Per Action. When the Lightning-Lord takes action, its hits are considered as follow-up attacks, with each hit dealing Lightning DMG equal to 33% of Jing Yuan's ATK to a random single enemy, and enemies adjacent to it also receive Lightning DMG equal to 25% of the DMG dealt to the target enemy.
The Lightning-Lord's Hits Per Action can reach a max of 10. Every time Lightning-Lord's Hits Per Action increases by 1, its SPD increases by 10. After the Lightning-Lord's action ends, its SPD and Hits Per Action return to their base values.
When Jing Yuan is knocked down, the Lightning-Lord will disappear.
When Jing Yuan is affected by Crowd Control debuff, the Lightning-Lord is unable to take action.

technique.name: Spirit Invocation
technique.description:
[Enhance]
After the Technique is used, the Lightning-Lord's Hits Per Action in the first turn increases by 3 at the start of the next battle.

traces.name: Battalia Crush
traces.description: If the Lightning-Lord's Hits Per Action is greater or equal to 6 in the next turn, its CRIT DMG increases by 25% for the next turn.

traces.name: Savant Providence
traces.description: At the start of the battle, immediately regenerates 15 Energy.

traces.name: War Marshal
traces.description: After Skill is used, CRIT Rate increases by 10% for 2 turn(s).
ATK +4%
ATK +8%

e1.name: Slash, Seas Split
e1.description: When Lightning-Lord attacks, the DMG multiplier on enemies adjacent to the target enemy increases by an extra amount equal to 25% of the DMG multiplier against the target enemy.

e2.name: Swing, Skies Squashed
e2.description: After Lightning-Lord takes action, DMG caused by Jing Yuan's Basic ATK, Skill, and Ultimate increases by 20% for 2 turn(s).

e3.name: Strike, Suns Subdued
e3.description:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

e4.name: Spin, Stars Sieged
e4.description: For each hit performed by the Lightning-Lord when it takes action, Jing Yuan regenerates 2 Energy.

e5.name: Stride, Spoils Seized
e5.description:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

e6.name: Sweep, Souls Slain
e6.description:
Each hit performed by the Lightning-Lord when it takes action will make the target enemy Vulnerable.
While Vulnerable, enemies receive 12% more DMG until the end of the Lightning-Lord's current turn, stacking up to 3 time(s).

description:
The Divine Foresight, one of the Seven Arbiter-Generals of the Xianzhou Alliance, leads the Cloud Knights of the Xianzhou Luofu.
A student of the Luofu's previous Sword Champion, though not known for his martial prowess.

name: Silver Wolf

attack.name: System Warning
attack.description:
[Single Target]
Deals Quantum DMG equal to 50% of Silver Wolf's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Allow Changes?
skill.description:
[Impair]
There is a 75% base chance to add 1 Weakness of an on-field ally's Type to the target enemy. This also reduces the enemy's DMG RES to that Weakness Type by 20% for 2 turn(s). If the enemy already has that Type Weakness, the effect of DMG RES reduction to that Weakness Type will not be triggered.
Each enemy can only have 1 Weakness implanted by Silver Wolf. When Silver Wolf implants another Weakness to the target, only the most recent implanted Weakness will be kept.
In addition, there is a 100% base chance to reduce the All-Type RES of the enemy further by 7.50% for 2 turn(s).
Deals Quantum DMG equal to 98% of Silver Wolf's ATK to this enemy.

ultimate.name: User Banned
ultimate.description:
[Impair] | Energy Cost: 110
There's a 85% base chance to decrease the target enemy's DEF by 36% for 3 turn(s). And at the same time, deals Quantum DMG equal to 228% of Silver Wolf's ATK to the target enemy.

talent.name: Awaiting System Response...
talent.description:
[Impair]
Silver Wolf can create three types of Bugs: reduce ATK by 5%, reduce DEF by 4%, and reduce SPD by 3%.
Every time Silver Wolf attacks, she has a 60% base chance to implant a random Bug that lasts for 3 turn(s) in the enemy target.

technique.name: Force Quit Program
technique.description: Immediately attacks the enemy. After entering battle, deals Quantum DMG equal to 80% of Silver Wolf's ATK to all enemies, and ignores Weakness Types and reduces Toughness from all enemies. Enemies with their Weakness Broken in this way will trigger the Quantum Weakness Break effect.

traces.name: Generate
traces.description: Bug's duration is extended for 1 turn(s). Every time an enemy is inflicted with Weakness Break, Silver Wolf has a 65% base chance of implanting a random Bug in the enemy.

traces.name: Inject
traces.description: The duration of the Weakness implanted by Silver Wolf's Skill increases by 1 turn(s).

traces.name: Side Note
traces.description: If there are 3 or more debuff(s) affecting the enemy when the Skill is used, then the Skill decreases the enemy's All-Type RES by an additional 3%.
ATK +4%

e1.name: Social Engineering
e1.description: After using her Ultimate to attack enemies, Silver Wolf regenerates 7 Energy for every debuff that the target enemy currently has. This effect can be triggered up to 5 time(s) in each use of her Ultimate.

e2.name: Zombie Network
e2.description: When an enemy enters battle, reduces their Effect RES by 20%.

e3.name: Payload
e3.description:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

e4.name: Bounce Attack
e4.description: After using her Ultimate to attack enemies, deals Additional Quantum DMG equal to 20% of Silver Wolf's ATK for every debuff currently on the enemy target. This effect can be triggered for a maximum of 5 time(s) during each use of her Ultimate.

e5.name: Brute Force Attack
e5.description:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

e6.name: Overlay Network
e6.description: For every debuff the target enemy has, the DMG dealt by Silver Wolf increases by 20%, up to a limit of 100%.

description: A member of the Stellaron Hunters and a genius hacker. She sees the universe as a massive immersive simulation game and has fun with it. She's mastered the skill known as "aether editing," which can be used to tamper with the data of reality.

name: Luocha

attack.name: Thorns of the Abyss
attack.description:
[Single Target]
Deals Imaginary DMG equal to 50% of Luocha's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Prayer of Abyss Flower
skill.description:
[Restore]
After using his Skill, Luocha immediately restores the target ally's HP equal to 40% of Luocha's ATK plus 200. Meanwhile, Luocha gains 1 stack of Abyss Flower.
When any ally's HP percentage drops to 50% or lower, an effect equivalent to Luocha's Skill will immediately be triggered and applied to this ally for one time (without consuming Skill Points). This effect can be triggered again after 2 turn(s).

ultimate.name: Death Wish
ultimate.description:
[AoE] | Energy Cost: 100
Removes 1 buff(s) from all enemies and deals Imaginary DMG equal to 120% of Luocha's ATK to all enemies. Luocha gains 1 stack of Abyss Flower.

talent.name: Cycle of Life
talent.description:
[Restore]
When Abyss Flower reaches 2 stacks, Luocha consumes all stacks of Abyss Flower to deploy a Field against the enemy.
When any enemy in the Field is attacked by an ally, the attacking ally's HP is immediately restored by an amount equal to 12% of Luocha's ATK plus 60.
The Field's effect lasts for 2 turns. When Luocha is knocked down, the Field will be dispelled.

technique.name: Mercy of a Fool
technique.description:
[Restore]
After the Technique is used, the Talent will be immediately triggered at the start of the next battle.

traces.name: Cleansing Revival
traces.description: When the Skill's effect is triggered, removes 1 debuff(s) from a target ally.

traces.name: Sanctified
traces.description: When any enemy in the Field is attacked by an ally, all allies (except the attacker) restore HP equal to 7% of Luocha's ATK plus 93.

traces.name: Through the Valley
traces.description: The chance to resist Crowd Control debuffs increases by 70%.
ATK +4%
ATK +8%

e1.name: Ablution of the Quick
e1.description: While the Field is active, ATK of all allies increases by 20%.

e2.name: Bestowal From the Pure
e2.description: When his Skill is triggered, if the target ally's HP is lower than 50%, Luocha's Outgoing Healing increases by 30%. If the target ally's HP is at 50% or higher, the ally receives a Shield that can absorb DMG equal to 18% of Luocha's ATK plus 240, lasting for 2 turns.

e3.name: Surveyal by the Fool
e3.description:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

e4.name: Heavy Lies the Crown
e4.description: When Luocha's Field is active, enemies become Weakened and deal 12% less DMG.

e5.name: Cicatrix 'Neath the Pain
e5.description:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

e6.name: Reunion With the Dust
e6.description: When Ultimate is used, there is a 100% fixed chance to reduce all enemies' All-Type RES by 20% for 2 turn(s).

materials.bossMat: Golden Crown of the Past Shadow

description: Carrying a coffin wherever he goes, he is a foreign trader who came from beyond the stellar seas. Has excellent medical skills.

name: Yukong

attack.name: Arrowslinger
attack.description:
[Single Target]
Deals Imaginary DMG equal to 50% of Yukong's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Emboldening Salvo
skill.description:
[Support]
Obtains 2 stack(s) of "Roaring Bowstrings" (to a maximum of 2 stacks). When "Roaring Bowstrings" is active, the ATK of all allies increases by 40%, and every time an ally's turn ends, Yukong loses 1 stack of "Roaring Bowstrings."
When it's the turn where Yukong gains "Roaring Bowstrings" by using Skill, "Roaring Bowstrings" will not be removed.

ultimate.name: Diving Kestrel
ultimate.description:
[Single Target] | Energy Cost: 130
If "Roaring Bowstrings" is active on Yukong when her Ultimate is used, additionally increases all allies' CRIT Rate by 21% and CRIT DMG by 39%. At the same time, deals Imaginary DMG equal to 228% of Yukong's ATK to a single enemy.

talent.name: Seven Layers, One Arrow
talent.description:
[Enhance]
Basic ATK additionally deals Imaginary DMG equal to 40% of Yukong's ATK, and increases the Toughness-Reducing DMG of this attack by 100%. This effect can be triggered again in 1 turn(s).

technique.name: Chasing the Wind
technique.description:
[Enhance]
After using her Technique, Yukong enters Sprint mode for 20 seconds. In Sprint mode, her Movement SPD increases by 35%, and Yukong gains 2 stack(s) of "Roaring Bowstrings" when she enters battle by attacking enemies.

traces.name: Archerion
traces.description: Yukong can resist 1 debuff application for 1 time. This effect can be triggered again in 2 turn(s).

traces.name: Bowmaster
traces.description: When Yukong is on the field, Imaginary DMG dealt by all allies increases by 12%.

traces.name: Majestas
traces.description: When "Roaring Bowstrings" is active, Yukong regenerates 2 additional Energy every time an ally takes action.
Imaginary DMG +3.2%

e1.name: Aerial Marshal
e1.description: At the start of battle, increases the SPD of all allies by 10% for 2 turn(s).

e2.name: Skyward Command
e2.description: When any ally's current energy is equal to its energy limit, Yukong regenerates an additional 5 energy. This effect can only be triggered once for each ally. The trigger count is reset after Yukong casts her Ultimate.

e3.name: Torrential Fusillade
e3.description:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

e4.name: Zephyrean Echoes
e4.description: When "Roaring Bowstrings" is active, Yukong deals 30% more DMG to enemies.

e5.name: August Deadshot
e5.description:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

e6.name: Bowstring Thunderclap
e6.description: When Yukong uses her Ultimate, she immediately gains 1 stack(s) of "Roaring Bowstrings."

materials.bossMat: Golden Crown of the Past Shadow

description: Head of the Sky-Faring Commission on the Xianzhou Luofu. Yukong was a seasoned pilot and a deadshot. Since heading up the commission, she's been buried under mountains of paperwork.

name: Blade

attack.name: Shard Sword
attack.description:
[Single Target]
Deals 50% of Blade's ATK as Wind DMG to a target enemy.

Forest of Swords
[Blast]
Consumes HP equal to 10% of Blade's Max HP and deals Wind DMG equal to the sum of 20% of his ATK and 50% of his Max HP to a single enemy. In addition, deals Wind DMG equal to the sum of 8% of Blade's ATK and 20% of his Max HP to adjacent targets.
If Blade's current HP is insufficient, his HP will be reduced to 1 when using Forest of Swords.
Forest of Swords cannot regenerate Skill Points.

skill.name: Hellscape
skill.description:
[Enhance]
Consumes HP equal to 30% of Blade's Max HP to enter the Hellscape state.
When Hellscape is active, his Skill cannot be used, his DMG dealt increases by 12%, and his Basic ATK Shard Sword is enhanced to Forest of Swords for 3 turn(s).
If Blade's current HP is insufficient, his HP will be reduced to 1 when he uses his Skill.
This Skill does not regenerate Energy. Using this Skill does not end the current turn.

ultimate.name: Death Sentence
ultimate.description:
[Blast] | Energy Cost: 130
Sets Blade's current HP to 50% of his Max HP and deals to a single enemy Wind DMG equal to the sum of 24% of his ATK, 60% of his Max HP, and 60% of the total HP he has lost in the current battle. At the same time, deals Wind DMG to adjacent targets equal to the sum of 9.6% of his ATK, 24% of his Max HP, and 24% of the total HP he has lost in the current battle.
The total HP Blade has lost in the current battle is capped at 90% of his Max HP. This value will be reset and re-accumulated after his Ultimate has been used.

talent.name: Shuhu's Gift
talent.description:
[AoE]
When Blade sustains DMG or consumes his HP, he gains 1 stack of Charge, stacking up to 5 times. A max of 1 Charge stack can be gained every time he is attacked.
When Charge stack reaches maximum, immediately launches a follow-up attack on all enemies, dealing Wind DMG equal to 22% of Blade's ATK plus 55% of his Max HP. At the same time, restores Blade's HP by 25% of his Max HP. After the follow-up attack, all Charges are consumed.

technique.name: Karma Wind
technique.description:
Immediately attacks the enemy. After entering combat, consumes 20% of Blade's Max HP while dealing Wind DMG equal to 40% of his Max HP to all enemies.
If Blade's current HP is insufficient, his HP will be reduced to 1 when this Technique is used.

traces.name: Vita Infinita
traces.description: When Blade's current HP is at 50% of Max HP or lower, Incoming Healing increases by 20%.

traces.name: Neverending Deaths
traces.description: If Blade hits a Weakness Broken enemy after using Forest of Swords, he will restore HP equal to 5% of his Max HP plus 100.

traces.name: Cyclone of Destruction
traces.description: DMG dealt by Talent's follow-up attack increases by 20%.
HP +4%

e1.name: Blade Cuts the Deepest in Hell
e1.description: Blade's Ultimate deals additionally increased DMG to a single enemy target, with the increased amount equal to 150% of Blade's total HP loss in the current battle. The total HP Blade has lost in the current battle is capped at 90% of his Max HP. This value will be reset and re-accumulated after his Ultimate has been used.

e2.name: Ten Thousand Sorrows From One Broken Dream
e2.description: When Blade is in the Hellscape state, his CRIT Rate increases by 15%.

e3.name: Hardened Blade Bleeds Coldest Shade
e3.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

e4.name: Rejected by Death, Infected With Life
e4.description: When Blade's current HP drops to 50% or lower of his Max HP, increases his Max HP by 20%. Stacks up to 2 time(s).

e5.name: Death By Ten Lords' Gaze
e5.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

e6.name: Reborn Into an Empty Husk
e6.description: The maximum number of Charge stacks is reduced to 4. The DMG of the follow-up attack triggered by Blade's Talent additionally increases by 50% of his Max HP.

description: A member of the Stellaron Hunters, and a swordsman who abandoned his blade. Pledges loyalty to Destiny's Slave, and possesses a terrifying self-healing ability.

name: Kafka

attack.name: Midnight Tumult
attack.description:
[Single Target]
Deals Lightning DMG equal to 50% of Kafka's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Caressing Moonlight
skill.description:
[Blast]
Deals Lightning DMG equal to 80% of Kafka's ATK to a target enemy and Lightning DMG equal to 30% of Kafka's ATK to enemies adjacent to it.
If the target enemy is currently receiving DoT, all DoTs currently placed on that enemy immediately produce DMG equal to 60% of their original DMG.

ultimate.name: Twilight Trill
ultimate.description:
[AoE] | Energy Cost: 120
Deals Lightning DMG equal to 48% of Kafka's ATK to all enemies, with a 100% base chance for enemies hit to become Shocked and immediately take DMG equal to 80% of the DoT. Shock lasts for 2 turn(s).
While Shocked, enemies receive Lightning DMG equal to 115% of Kafka's ATK at the beginning of each turn.

talent.name: Gentle But Cruel
talent.description:
[Single Target]
After an ally of Kafka's uses Basic ATK on an enemy target, Kafka immediately launches 1 follow-up attack and deals Lightning DMG equal to 42% of her ATK to that target, with a 100% base chance to inflict Shock equivalent to that applied by her Ultimate to the attacked enemy target for 2 turns. This effect can only be triggered 1 time per turn.

technique.name: Mercy Is Not Forgiveness
technique.description: Immediately attacks all enemies within a set range. After entering battle, deals Lightning DMG equal to 50% of Kafka's ATK to all enemies, with a 100% base chance to inflict Shock equivalent to that applied by her Ultimate on every enemy target for 2 turn(s).

traces.name: Torture
traces.description: When the Ultimate is used, enemy targets will now receive DMG immediately from all currently applied DoT sources instead of just receiving DMG immediately from the currently applied Shock state.

traces.name: Plunder
traces.description: If an enemy is defeated while Shocked, Kafka additionally regenerates 5 Energy.

traces.name: Thorns
traces.description: The base chance for Ultimate, Technique, or the follow-up attack triggered by the Talent to inflict Shock increases by 30%.
ATK +4%

e1.name: Da Capo
e1.description: When the Talent triggers a follow-up attack, there is a 100% base chance to increase the DoT received by the target by 30% for 2 turn(s).

e2.name: Fortississimo
e2.description: While Kafka is on the field, DoT dealt by all allies increases by 25%.

e3.name: Capriccio
e3.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

e4.name: Recitativo
e4.description: When an enemy target takes DMG from the Shock status inflicted by Kafka, Kafka additionally regenerates 2 Energy.

e5.name: Doloroso
e5.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

e6.name: Leggiero
e6.description: The DMG multiplier for Shock DMG dealt by Ultimate, Technique, or the follow-up attack triggered by Talent increases by 156%, and extends the duration of Shock on the enemy target by 1 turn(s).

description: A member of the Stellaron Hunters. A dashing, collected, and professional beauty. Used the enchantment of Spirit Whisper to set up Trailblazer to absorb the Stellaron. Her hobby is shopping for and organizing her collection of coats.

name: Luka

attack.name: Direct Punch
attack.description:
[Single Target]
Deals Physical DMG equal to 50% of Luka's ATK to a single enemy.

Sky-Shatter Fist
[Single Target]
Consumes 2 stacks of Fighting Will. First, uses Direct Punch to deal 3 hits, with each hit dealing Physical DMG equal to 10% of Luka's ATK to a single enemy target.
Then, uses Rising Uppercut to deal 1 hit, dealing Physical DMG equal to 40% of Luka's ATK to the single enemy target.

skill.name: Lacerating Fist
skill.description:
[Single Target]
Deals Physical DMG equal to 60% of Luka's ATK to a single enemy target. In addition, there is a 100% base chance to inflict Bleed on them, lasting for 3 turn(s).
While Bleeding, the enemy will take 24.0% of their Max HP as Physical DMG at the start of each turn. This DMG will not exceed more than 130% of Luka's ATK.

ultimate.name: Coup de Grâce
ultimate.description:
[Single Target] | Energy Cost: 130
Receives 2 stack(s) of Fighting Will, with a 100% base chance to increase a single enemy target's DMG received by 12% for 3 turn(s). Then, deals Physical DMG equal to 198% of Luka's ATK to the target.

talent.name: Flying Sparks
talent.description:
[Enhance]
After Luka uses his Basic ATK "Direct Punch" or Skill "Lacerating Fist," he receives 1 stack(s) of Fighting Will, up to 4 stacks. When he has 2 or more stacks of Fighting Will, his Basic ATK "Direct Punch" is enhanced to "Sky-Shatter Fist." After his Enhanced Basic ATK's "Rising Uppercut" hits a Bleeding enemy target, the Bleed status will immediately deal DMG for 1 time equal to 68% of the original DMG to the target. At the start of battle, Luka will possess 1 stack of Fighting Will.

technique.name: Anticipator
technique.description: Immediately attacks the enemy. Upon entering battle, Luka deals Physical DMG equal to 50% of his ATK to a random single enemy with a 100% base chance to inflict his Skill's Bleed effect on the target. Then, Luka gains 1 additional stack of Fighting Will.

traces.name: Kinetic Overload
traces.description: When the Skill is used, immediately dispels 1 buff from the enemy target.

traces.name: Cycle Braking
traces.description: For every stack of Fighting Will obtained, additionally regenerates 3 Energy.

traces.name: Crush Fighting Will
traces.description: When using Enhanced Basic ATK, every hit Direct Punch deals has a 50% fixed chance for Luka to use 1 additional hit. This effect does not apply to additional hits generated in this way.
ATK +4%

e1.name: Fighting Endlessly
e1.description: When Luka takes action, if the target enemy is Bleeding, increases DMG dealt by Luka by 15% for 2 turn(s).

e2.name: The Enemy is Weak, I am Strong
e2.description: If the Skill hits an enemy target with Physical Weakness, gain 1 stack(s) of Fighting Will.

e3.name: Born for the Ring
e3.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

e4.name: Never Turning Back
e4.description: For every stack of Fighting Will obtained, increases ATK by 5%, stacking up to 4 time(s).

e5.name: The Spirit of Wildfire
e5.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

e6.name: A Champion's Applause
e6.description: After the Enhanced Basic ATK's "Rising Uppercut" hits a Bleeding enemy target, the Bleed status will immediately deal DMG 1 time equal to 8% of the original DMG for every hit of Direct Punch already unleashed during the current Enhanced Basic ATK.

description: The boxing champion in Belobog's Underworld, and one of Wildfire's most capable fighters. The consecutive champion of the Fight Club, his enthusiasm inspires children of the Underworld who dare to dream.

name: Imbibitor Lunae

attack.name: Beneficent Lotus
attack.description:
[Single Target]
Uses a 2-hit attack and deals Imaginary DMG equal to 50% of Imbibitor Lunae's ATK to a single enemy target.

Transcendence
[Single Target]
Uses a 3-hit attack and deals Imaginary DMG equal to 130% of Imbibitor Lunae's ATK to a single enemy target.

Divine Spear
[Blast]
Uses a 5-hit attack, dealing Imaginary DMG equal to 190% of Imbibitor Lunae's ATK to a single enemy target. From the fourth hit onward, simultaneously deal Imaginary DMG equal to 30% of Imbibitor Lunae's ATK to adjacent targets.

Fulgurant Leap
[Blast]
Uses a 7-hit attack, dealing Imaginary DMG equal to 250% of Imbibitor Lunae's ATK to a single enemy target. From the fourth hit onward, simultaneously deal Imaginary DMG equal to 90% of Imbibitor Lunae's ATK to adjacent targets.

skill.name: Dracore Libre
skill.description:
[Enhance]
Enhances Basic ATK. Enhancements may be applied up to 3 times consecutively. Using this ability does not consume Skill Points and is not considered as using a Skill.
Enhanced once, Beneficent Lotus becomes Transcendence.
Enhanced twice, Beneficent Lotus becomes Divine Spear.
Enhanced 3 times, Beneficent Lotus becomes Fulgurant Leap.
When using Divine Spear or Fulgurant Leap, starting from the fourth hit, 1 stack of Outroar is gained before every hit. Each stack of Outroar increases Imbibitor Lunae's CRIT DMG by 6%, for a max of 4 stacks. These stacks last until the end of his turn.

ultimate.name: Azure's Aqua Ablutes All
ultimate.description:
[Blast] | Energy Cost: 140
Uses a 3-hit attack and deals Imaginary DMG equal to 180% of Imbibitor Lunae's ATK to a single enemy target. At the same time, deals Imaginary DMG equal to 84% of Imbibitor Lunae's ATK to adjacent targets. Then, obtains 2 Squama Sacrosancta.
It's possible to hold up to 3 Squama Sacrosancta, which can be used to offset the consumption of Imbibitor Lunae's skill points. Consuming Squama Sacrosancta is considered equivalent to consuming skill points.

talent.name: Righteous Heart
talent.description:
[Enhance]
After each hit dealt during an attack, Imbibitor Lunae gains 1 stack of Righteous Heart, increasing his DMG by 5%. This effect can stack up to 6 time(s), lasting until the end of his turn.

technique.name: Heaven-Quelling Prismadrakon
technique.description:
[Enhance]
After using his Technique, Imbibitor Lunae enters the Leaping Dragon state for 20 seconds. While in the Leaping Dragon state, using his attack enables him to move forward rapidly for a set distance, attacking all enemies he touches and blocking all incoming attacks. After entering combat via attacking enemies in the Leaping Dragon state, Imbibitor Lunae deals Imaginary DMG equal to 120% of his ATK to all enemies, and gains 1 Squama Sacrosancta.

traces.name: Star Veil
traces.description: At the start of the battle, immediately regenerates 15 Energy.

traces.name: Aqua Reign
traces.description: Increases the chance to resist Crowd Control debuffs by 35%.

traces.name: Jolt Anew
traces.description: This character's CRIT DMG increases by 24% when dealing DMG to enemy targets with Imaginary Weakness.
Imaginary DMG +3.2%

e1.name: Tethered to Sky
e1.description: Increase the stackable Righteous Heart count by 4, and gains 1 extra stack of Righteous Heart for each hit per attack.

e2.name: Imperium On Cloud Nine
e2.description: After using his Ultimate, Imbibitor Lunae's action is Advanced Forward by 100% and gains 1 extra Squama Sacrosancta.

e3.name: Clothed in Clouds
e3.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

e4.name: Zephyr's Bliss
e4.description: The buff effect granted by Outroar lasts until the end of this character's next turn.

e5.name: Fall is the Pride
e5.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

e6.name: Reign, Returned
e6.description: After any other ally uses their Ultimate, the Imaginary RES PEN of Imbibitor Lunae's next Fulgurant Leap attack increases by 20%. This effect can stack up to 3 time(s).

description: Dan Heng's true form from his Vidyadhara lineage carries the residual power left behind by his past incarnation, the Imbibitor Lunae. Upon accepting the majestic horns atop his crown, he must accept all the merits and faults attributed to that sinner.

name: Fu Xuan

attack.name: Novaburst
attack.description:
[Single Target]
Deals 25% of Fu Xuan's HP as Quantum DMG to a single enemy.

skill.name: Known by Stars, Shown by Hearts
skill.description:
[Defense]
Activates Matrix of Prescience, via which other team members will Distribute 65% of the DMG they receive (before this DMG is mitigated by any Shields) to Fu Xuan for 3 turn(s).
While affected by Matrix of Prescience, all team members gain the Knowledge effect, which increases their respective Max HP by 3% of Fu Xuan's Max HP, and increases CRIT Rate by 6%.
When Fu Xuan is knocked down, the Matrix of Prescience will be dispelled.

ultimate.name: Woes of Many Morphed to One
ultimate.description:
[AoE] | Energy Cost: 135
Deals Quantum DMG equal to 60% of Fu Xuan's Max HP to all enemies and obtains 1 trigger count for the HP Restore effect granted by Fu Xuan's Talent.

talent.name: Bleak Breeds Bliss
talent.description:
[Restore]
While Fu Xuan has not been knocked down, Misfortune Avoidance is applied to the entire team. While affected by Misfortune Avoidance, allies take 10% less DMG.
HP Restore will be triggered for Fu Xuan when her HP falls to 50% of her Max HP or less. This effect will restore her HP by 80% of the amount of HP she is currently missing. This effect cannot be triggered if she receives a killing blow. This effect possesses 1 trigger count by default, and can have a maximum of 2 trigger counts.

technique.name: Of Fortune Comes Fate
technique.description:
[Defense]
After the Technique is used, all team members receive a Barrier, lasting for 20 seconds. This Barrier can block all enemy attacks, and the team will not enter battle when attacked. Entering battle while the Barrier is active will have Fu Xuan automatically activate Matrix of Prescience at the start of the battle, lasting for 2 turn(s).

traces.description: CRIT Rate +2.7%

subTraces.name: Taiyi, the Macrocosmic
subTraces.description: When Matrix of Prescience is active, Fu Xuan will regenerate 20 extra Energy when she uses her Skill.

subTraces.name: Dunjia, the Metamystic
subTraces.description: When Fu Xuan's Ultimate is used, heals all other allies by an amount equal to 5% of Fu Xuan's Max HP plus 133.

traces.name: Liuren, the Sexagenary
traces.description: If a target enemy applies Crowd Control debuffs to allies while the Matrix of Prescience is active, all allies will resist all Crowd Control debuffs applied by the enemy target during the current action. This effect can only be triggered once. When Matrix of Prescience is activated again, the number of times this effect can be triggered will reset.
Effect RES +4%
CRIT Rate +4%

e1.name: Dominus Pacis
e1.description: All units with Knowledge increase their CRIT DMG by 30%.

e2.name: Optimus Felix
e2.description: When Matrix of Prescience is active while any team member is struck by a killing blow, all allies who were struck by a killing blow during this action will not be knocked down and 70% of their Max HP is immediately restored. This effect can trigger 1 time per battle.

e3.name: Apex Nexus
e3.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

e4.name: Fortuna Stellaris
e4.description: When other allies under Matrix of Prescience are attacked, Fu Xuan regenerates 5 Energy.

e5.name: Arbiter Primus
e5.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

e6.name: Omnia Vita
e6.description: Once Matrix of Prescience is activated, it will accumulate the total HP lost by all team members in the current battle. Fu Xuan's Ultimate DMG will increase by 200% of the total HP lost by all team members in the current battle. The total HP lost by all team members in the current battle is capped at 120% of Fu Xuan's Max HP. This value will be reset and re-accumulated after her Ultimate has been used.

description: Head of the Divination Commission on the Luofu. The person who uses the third eye and Matrix of Prescience to foretell the route of Xianzhou and the outcomes of events.

name: Lynx

attack.name: Ice Crampon Technique
attack.description:
[Single Target]
Deals Quantum DMG equal to 25% of Lynx's Max HP to a single enemy.

skill.name: Salted Camping Cans
skill.description:
[Restore]
Applies Survival Response to a single target ally and increases their Max HP by 5% of Lynx's Max HP plus 50. If the target ally is a character on the Path of Destruction or Preservation, the chance of them being attacked by enemies will greatly increase. Survival Response lasts for 2 turn(s).
Restores the target's HP by 8% of Lynx's Max HP plus 80.

ultimate.name: Snowfield First Aid
ultimate.description:
[Restore] | Energy Cost: 100
Dispels 1 debuff(s) from all allies and immediately restores their respective HP by an amount equal to 9% of Lynx's Max HP plus 90.

talent.name: Outdoor Survival Experience
talent.description:
[Restore]
When using Lynx's Skill or Ultimate, applies continuous healing to the target ally for 2 turn(s), restoring HP by an amount equal to 2.4% of Lynx's Max HP plus 24 at the start of each turn. If the target has Survival Response, the continuous healing effect additionally restores HP by an amount equal to 3% of Lynx's Max HP plus 30.

technique.name: Chocolate Energy Bar
technique.description:
[Restore]
After Lynx uses her Technique, at the start of the next battle, all allies are granted the continuous healing effect from her Talent for 2 turn(s).

traces.name: Advance Surveying
traces.description: After a target with Survival Response is hit, Lynx regenerates 2 Energy immediately.

traces.name: Exploration Techniques
traces.description: The chance to resist Crowd Control debuffs increases by 35%.

traces.name: Survival in the Extreme
traces.description: Extends the duration of the continuous healing effect granted by Talent for 1 turn(s).
HP +4%
HP +8%

e1.name: Morning of Snow Hike
e1.description: When healing allies with HP equal to or lower than 50%, Lynx's Outgoing Healing increases by 20%. This effect also works on continuous healing.

e2.name: Noon of Portable Furnace
e2.description: A target with Survival Response can resist debuff application for 1 time(s).

e3.name: Afternoon of Avalanche Beacon
e3.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

e4.name: Dusk of Warm Campfire
e4.description: When Survival Response is gained, increases the target's ATK by an amount equal to 3% of Lynx's Max HP for 1 turn(s).

e5.name: Night of Aurora Tea
e5.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

e6.name: Dawn of Explorers' Chart
e6.description: Additionally boosts the Max HP increasing effect of Survival Response by an amount equal to 6.0% of Lynx's Max HP and increases Effect RES by 30%.

description: A Belobogian Snow Plains Explorer, and the youngest of the Landau siblings. Calm and collected, with a strong drive for action. Often embarks on solo adventures to explore the snowy wilderness.

name: Jingliu

attack.name: Lucent Moonglow
attack.description:
[Single Target]
Deals Ice DMG equal to 50% of Jingliu's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Transcendent Flash
skill.description:
[Single Target]
Deals Ice DMG equal to 100% of Jingliu's ATK to a single enemy and obtains 1 stack(s) of Syzygy.

Moon On Glacial River
[Blast]
Deals Ice DMG equal to 125% of Jingliu's ATK to a single enemy, and deals Ice DMG equal to 62% of Jingliu's ATK to adjacent enemies. Consumes 1 stack(s) of Syzygy. Using this ability does not consume Skill Points.

ultimate.name: Florephemeral Dreamflux
ultimate.description:
[Blast] | Energy Cost: 140
Deals Ice DMG equal to 180% of Jingliu's ATK to a single enemy, and deals Ice DMG equal to 90% of Jingliu's ATK to any adjacent enemies. Gains 1 stack(s) of Syzygy after attack ends.

talent.name: Crescent Transmigration
talent.description:
[Enhance]
When Jingliu has 2 stack(s) of Syzygy, she enters the Spectral Transmigration state with her Action Advanced by 100% and her CRIT Rate increases by 40%. Then, Jingliu's Skill "Transcendent Flash" becomes enhanced and turns into "Moon On Glacial River", and becomes the only ability she can use in battle. When Jingliu uses an attack in the Spectral Transmigration state, she consumes HP from all other allies equal to 4% of their respective Max HP (this cannot reduce allies' HP to lower than 1). Jingliu's ATK increases by 540% of the total HP consumed from all allies in this attack, capped at 90% of her base ATK, lasting until the current attack ends. Jingliu cannot enter the Spectral Transmigration state again until the current Spectral Transmigration state ends. Syzygy can stack up to 3 times. When Syzygy stacks become 0, Jingliu will exit the Spectral Transmigration state.

technique.name: Innermost Nature
technique.description:
[Impair]
After using this Technique, creates a dimension around Jingliu that lasts for 20 seconds, and all enemies in this dimension will become Frozen. After entering combat with enemies in the dimension, Jingliu immediately regenerates 15 Energy and obtains 1 stack(s) of Syzygy, with a 100% base chance of Freezing enemy targets for 1 turn(s). While Frozen, enemy targets cannot take action, and receive Ice Additional DMG equal to 80% of Jingliu's ATK at the start of every turn. Only 1 dimension created by allies can exist at the same time.

traces.name: Deathrealm
traces.description: While in the Spectral Transmigration state, increases Effect RES by 35%.

traces.name: Sword Champion
traces.description: After using Transcendent Flash, the next action will be Advanced Forward by 10%.

traces.name: Frost Wraith
traces.description: While in the Spectral Transmigration state, increases Ultimate DMG by 20%.
CRIT DMG +5.3%

e1.name: Moon Crashes Tianguan Gate
e1.description: When using her Ultimate or Enhanced Skill, Jingliu's CRIT DMG increases by 24% for 1 turn(s). If only one enemy target is attacked, the target will additionally be dealt Ice DMG equal to 100% of Jingliu's ATK.

e2.name: Crescent Shadows Qixing Dipper
e2.description: After using Ultimate, increases the DMG of the next Enhanced Skill by 80%.

e3.name: Halfmoon Gapes Mercurial Haze
e3.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

e4.name: Lunarlance Shines Skyward Dome
e4.description: During the Spectral Transmigration state, the ATK gained from consuming allies' HP is additionally increased by 90% of the total HP consumed from the entire team. The cap for ATK gained this way also increases by 30%.

e5.name: Night Shades Astral Radiance
e5.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

e6.name: Eclipse Hollows Corporeal Husk
e6.description: When Jingliu enters the Spectral Transmigration state, the Syzygy stack limit increases by 1, and Jingliu obtains 1 stack(s) of Syzygy. While she is in the Spectral Transmigration state, her CRIT DMG increases by 50%.

description: Former Sword Champion of the Luofu, and the creator of the Cloud Knights' legends of undefeated might. Now, her name has been wiped from the records, and she is a traitor of the Xianzhou walking on the fine line between sanity and mara-struck.

name: Guinaifen

attack.name: Standing Ovation
attack.description:
[Single Target]
Deals Fire DMG equal to 50% of Guinaifen's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Blazing Welcome
skill.description:
[Blast]
Deals Fire DMG equal to 60% of Guinaifen's ATK to a single enemy and deals Fire DMG equal to 20% of Guinaifen's ATK to any adjacent enemies with a 100% base chance to Burn the target and adjacent targets. When Burned, enemies will take a Fire DMG equal to 83% of Guinaifen's ATK at the beginning of each turn, lasting for 2 turn(s).

ultimate.name: Watch This Showstopper
ultimate.description:
[AoE] | Energy Cost: 120
Deals Fire DMG equal to 72% of Guinaifen's ATK to all enemies. If the target enemy is currently inflicted with Burn, then their Burn status immediately produce DMG equal to 72% of their original DMG.

talent.name: PatrAeon Benefits
talent.description:
[Impair]
When Guinaifen is on the field, there is a 100% base chance to apply Firekiss to an enemy after their Burn status causes DMG. While inflicted with Firekiss, the enemy receives 4% increased DMG, which lasts for 3 turn(s) and can stack up to 3 time(s).

technique.name: Skill Showcase
technique.description: Immediately attacks the enemy. After entering battle, deals DMG for 4 time(s), dealing Fire DMG equal to 50% of Guinaifen's ATK to a random single enemy target each time, with a 100% base chance of inflicting Firekiss on them.

traces.name: High Poles
traces.description: Basic ATK has a 80% base chance of inflicting an enemy with a Burn, equivalent to that of Skill.

traces.name: Bladed Hoop
traces.description: When the battle begins, Guinaifen's action is advanced forward by 25%.

traces.name: Walking on Knives
traces.description: Deals 20% more DMG to Burned enemies.
Fire DMG +3.2%

e1.name: Slurping Noodles During Handstand
e1.description: When Skill is used, there is a 100% base chance to reduce the attacked target enemy's Effect RES by 10% for 2 turn(s).

e2.name: Brushing Teeth While Whistling
e2.description: When an enemy target is Burned, Guinaifen's Basic ATK and Skill can increase the DMG multiplier of their Burn status by 40%.

e3.name: Smashing Boulder on Chest
e3.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

e4.name: Blocking Pike with Neck
e4.description: Every time the Burn status inflicted by Guinaifen causes DMG, Guinaifen regenerates 2 Energy.

e5.name: Swallowing Sword to Stomach
e5.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

e6.name: Catching Bullet with Hands
e6.description: Increases the stackable Firekiss count by 1.

description: A performance artist visiting the Xianzhou Luofu — in other words, a street performer. She's chasing a new life on the Luofu when not concerned with food and shelter.

name: Topaz and Numby

attack.name: Deficit...
attack.description:
[Single Target]
Deals Fire DMG equal to 50% of Topaz's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Difficulty Paying?
skill.description:
[Single Target]
Inflicts a single target enemy with a Proof of Debt status, increasing the DMG it takes from follow-up attacks by 25%. Proof of Debt only takes effect on the most recent target it is applied to. If there are no enemies inflicted with Proof of Debt on the field when an ally's turn starts or when an ally takes action, Topaz will inflict a random enemy with Proof of Debt.
Numby deals Fire DMG equal to 75% of Topaz's ATK to this target. Using this Skill to deal DMG is considered as launching a follow-up attack.

ultimate.name: Turn a Profit!
ultimate.description:
[Enhance] | Energy Cost: 130
Numby enters the Windfall Bonanza! state and its DMG multiplier increases by 75% and CRIT DMG increases by 12%. Also, when enemies with Proof of Debt are hit by an ally's Basic ATK, Skill, or Ultimate, Numby's action is Advanced Forward by 50%. Numby exits the Windfall Bonanza! state after using 2 attacks.

talent.name: Trotter Market!?
talent.description:
[Single Target]
Summons Numby at the start of battle. Numby has 80 SPD by default. When taking action, Numby launches follow-up attacks on a single enemy target afflicted with Proof of Debt, dealing Fire DMG equal to 75% of Topaz's ATK.
When enemies afflicted with Proof of Debt receive an ally's follow-up attacks, Numby's action is Advanced Forward by 50%. The action Advance Forward effect cannot be triggered during Numby's own turn.
When Topaz is downed, Numby disappears.

technique.name: Explicit Subsidy
technique.description:
[Enhance]
Summons Numby when Topaz enters the overworld. Numby will automatically search for Basic Treasures and Trotters within a set radius.
Using her Technique will regenerate 60 Energy for Topaz after Numby's first attack in the next battle.
If Topaz is still in the team after using her Technique and defeating overworld enemies, a small bonus amount of credits will be added to the earned credits. A maximum of 10000 bonus credits can be received per calendar day.
After using her Technique and defeating enemies in Simulated Universe, additionally receive a small amount of Cosmic Fragments with a small chance to obtain 1 random Curio.

traces.name: Overdraft
traces.description: When Topaz uses Basic ATK to deal DMG, it will be considered as a follow-up attack.

traces.name: Financial Turmoil
traces.description: Increases Topaz and Numby's DMG dealt to enemy targets with Fire Weakness by 15%.

traces.name: Stonks Market
traces.description: After Numby uses an attack while in the Windfall Bonanza! state, Topaz additionally regenerates 10 Energy.
Fire DMG +3.2%
HP +4%
Fire DMG +4.8%

e1.name: Future Market
e1.description: When enemies afflicted with Proof of Debt receive follow-up attacks, they will enter the Debtor state. This can take effect only once within a single action. The Debtor state increases the CRIT DMG of follow-up attacks inflicted on the target enemies by 25%, stacking up to 2 time(s). When Proof of Debt is removed, the Debtor state is also removed.

e2.name: Bona Fide Acquisition
e2.description: After Numby takes action and launches an attack, Topaz regenerates 5 Energy.

e3.name: Seize the Big and Free the Small
e3.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

e4.name: Agile Operation
e4.description: After Numby's turn begins, Topaz's action is Advanced Forward by 20%.

e5.name: Inflationary Demand
e5.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

e6.name: Incentive Mechanism
e6.description: Numby's attack count during the Windfall Bonanza! state increases by 1, and its Fire RES PEN increases by 10% when it attacks.

description: Topaz is the Leader of the Special Debts Picket Team and high-level manager of the Strategic Investment Department under the Interastral Peace Corporation. A member of the "Ten Stonehearts" at a young age, Topaz's foundational expertise is "debt retrieval". Her partner, the Warp Trotter "Numby", is also capable of keenly perceiving where "riches" are located, ensuring that jobs based in security, debt collection, and actuarial varieties are of no great challenge. At presently they are traveling the cosmos together, seeking all manner of liability disputes that might be affecting the stable progression of the IPC's businesses.

name: Huohuo

attack.name: Banner: Stormcaller
attack.description:
[Single Target]
Deals Wind DMG equal to 25% of Huohuo's Max HP to a target enemy.

skill.name: Talisman: Protection
skill.description:
[Restore]
Dispels 1 debuff(s) from a single target ally and immediately restores this ally's HP by an amount equal to 14% of Huohuo's Max HP plus 140. At the same time, restores HP for allies that are adjacent to this target ally by an amount equal to 11.2% of Huohuo's Max HP plus 112.

ultimate.name: Tail: Spiritual Domination
ultimate.description:
[Support] | Energy Cost: 140
Regenerates Energy for all allies (excluding this character) by an amount equal to 15% of their respective Max Energy. At the same time, increases their ATK by 24% for 2 turn(s).

talent.name: Possession: Ethereal Metaflow
talent.description:
[Restore]
After using her Skill, Huohuo gains Divine Provision, lasting for 2 turn(s). This duration decreases by 1 turn at the start of each Huohuo's turn. If Huohuo has Divine Provision when an ally's turn starts or when an ally uses their Ultimate, restores HP for that ally by an amount equal to 3% of Huohuo's Max HP plus 30. At the same time, every ally with 50% HP or lower receives healing once.
When Divine Provision is triggered to heal an ally, dispel 1 debuff(s) from that ally. This effect can be triggered up to 6 time(s). Using the skill again resets the effect's trigger count.

technique.name: Fiend: Impeachment of Evil
technique.description:
[Impair]
Huohuo terrorizes surrounding enemies, afflicting Horror-Struck on them. Enemies in Horror-Struck will flee away from Huohuo for 10 second(s). When entering battle with enemies in Horror-Struck, there is a 100% base chance of reducing every single enemy's ATK by 25% for 2 turn(s).

traces.name: Fearful to Act
traces.description: When battle starts, Huohuo gains Divine Provision, lasting for 1 turn(s).

traces.name: The Cursed One
traces.description: The chance to resist Crowd Control Debuffs increases by 35%.

traces.name: Stress Reaction to Horror
traces.description: When her Talent is triggered to heal allies, Huohuo regenerates 1 Energy.
HP +4%
HP +8%

e1.name: Anchored to Vessel, Specters Nestled
e1.description: The duration of Divine Provision produced by the Talent is extended by 1 turn(s). When Huohuo possesses Divine Provision, all allies' SPD increases by 12%.

e2.name: Sealed in Tail, Wraith Subdued
e2.description: If Huohuo possesses Divine Provision when an ally is struck by a killing blow, the ally will not be knocked down, and their HP will immediately be restored by an amount equal to 50% of their Max HP. This reduces the duration of Divine Provision by 1 turn. This effect can only be triggered 2 time(s) per battle.

e3.name: Cursed by Fate, Moths to Flame
e3.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

e4.name: Tied in Life, Bound to Strife
e4.description: When healing a target ally via Skill or Talent, the less HP the target ally currently has, the higher the amount of healing they will receive. The maximum increase in healing provided by Huohuo is 80%.

e5.name: Mandated by Edict, Evils Evicted
e5.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

e6.name: Woven Together, Cohere Forever
e6.description: When healing a target ally, increases the target ally's DMG dealt by 50% for 2 turn(s).

description: A trainee Ten-Lords Commission Judge of the Xianzhou Luofu, she is a young Foxian girl possessed by a heliobus. She is a timid and weak girl who is afraid of all kinds of strange things, but is responsible for luring and subduing evil spirits.

voiceActors.jp: Maria Naganawa (長縄 まりあ) & Takeshi Hirabayashi (平林 剛)

name: Argenti

attack.name: Fleeting Fragrance
attack.description:
[Single Target]
Deals Physical DMG equal to 50% of Argenti's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Justice, Hereby Blooms
skill.description:
[AoE]
Deals Physical DMG equal to 60% of Argenti's ATK to all enemies.

ultimate.name: For In This Garden Supreme Beauty Bestows
ultimate.description:
[AoE] | Energy Cost: 90
Consumes 90 Energy and deals Physical DMG equal to 96% of Argenti's ATK to all enemies.

Merit Bestowed in "My" Garden
[AoE] | Energy Cost: 180
Consumes 180 Energy and deals Physical DMG equal to 168% of Argenti's ATK to all enemies. And further deals DMG for 6 extra time(s), with each time dealing Physical DMG equal to 56% of Argenti's ATK to a random enemy.

talent.name: Sublime Object
talent.description:
[Enhance]
For every enemy hit when Argenti uses his Basic Attack, Skill, or Ultimate, regenerates Argenti's Energy by 3, and grants him a stack of Apotheosis, increasing his CRIT Rate by 1%. This effect can stack up to 10 time(s).

technique.name: Manifesto of Purest Virtue
technique.description:
[Impair]
After using the Technique, enemies in a set area are inflicted with Daze for 10 second(s). Dazed enemies will not actively attack the team.
When attacking a Dazed enemy to enter combat, deals Physical DMG to all enemies equal to 80% of Argenti's ATK and regenerates his Energy by 15.

traces.name: Piety
traces.description: At the start of a turn, immediately gains 1 stack(s) of Apotheosis.

traces.name: Generosity
traces.description: When enemy targets enter battle, immediately regenerates 2 Energy for self.

traces.name: Courage
traces.description: Deals 15% more DMG to enemies whose HP percentage is 50% or less.
ATK +4%
ATK +8%

e1.name: A Lacuna in Kingdom of Aesthetics
e1.description: Each stack of Apotheosis additionally increases CRIT DMG by 4%.

e2.name: Agate's Humility
e2.description: If the number of enemies on the field equals to 3 or more when the Ultimate is used, ATK increases by 40% for 1 turn(s).

e3.name: Thorny Road's Glory
e3.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

e4.name: Trumpet's Dedication
e4.description: At the start of battle, gains 2 stack(s) of Apotheosis and increases the maximum stack limit of the Talent's effect by 2.

e5.name: Snow, From Somewhere in Cosmos
e5.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

e6.name: "Your" Resplendence
e6.description: When using Ultimate, ignores 30% of enemy targets' DEF.

description: A classic knight of the "Knights of Beauty" who is piously seeking his missing Aeon Idrila the "Beauty." Forthright and candid, he wanders the cosmos espousing the virtues of Idrila's good name.

name: Hanya

attack.name: Oracle Brush
attack.description:
[Single Target]
Deals Physical DMG equal to 50% of Hanya's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Samsara, Locked
skill.description:
[Single Target]
Deals Physical DMG equal to 120% of Hanya's ATK to a single enemy, then applies Burden to them.
For every 2 Basic ATKs, Skills, or Ultimates allies use on an enemy with Burden, allies will immediately recover 1 Skill Point. Burden is only active on the latest target it is applied to, and will be dispelled automatically after the Skill Point recovery effect has been triggered 2 times.

ultimate.name: Ten-Lords' Decree, All Shall Obey
ultimate.description:
[Enhance] | Energy Cost: 140
Increases the SPD of a target ally by 15% of Hanya's SPD and increases the same target ally's ATK by 36%, lasting for 2 turn(s).

talent.name: Sanction
talent.description:
[Support]
When an ally uses a Basic ATK, Skill, or Ultimate on an enemy inflicted with Burden, the DMG dealt increases by 15%, lasting for 2 turn(s).

technique.name: Netherworld Judgment
technique.description: Immediately attacks the enemy. After entering battle, applies Burden equivalent to that applied by the Skill to a random enemy.

traces.name: Scrivener
traces.description: Allies triggering Burden's Skill Point recovery effect have their ATK increased by 10% for 1 turn(s).

traces.name: Netherworld
traces.description: If the trigger count for the Burden's Skill Point recovery effect is 1 or lower when an enemy with Burden is defeated, then additionally recovers 1 Skill Point(s).

traces.name: Reanimated
traces.description: When Burden's Skill Point recovery effect is triggered, this character regenerates 2 Energy.
ATK +4%

e1.name: One Heart
e1.description: When an ally with Hanya's Ultimate's effect defeats an enemy, Hanya's action is Advanced Forward by 15%. This effect can only be triggered 1 time(s) per turn.

e2.name: Two Views
e2.description: After using the Skill, this character's SPD increases by 20% for 1 turn(s).

e3.name: Three Temptations
e3.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

e4.name: Four Truths
e4.description: The Ultimate's duration is additionally extended for 1 turn(s).

e5.name: Five Skandhas
e5.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

e6.name: Six Reverences
e6.description: Increase the DMG Boost effect of the Talent by an additional 10%.

description: One of the judges of the Xianzhou Luofu's Ten-Lords Commission. Ordained by the Ten-Lords and wielding the authority of the Oracle Brush, she reads the multitudes of human sins and transgressions, then issues punishments and karmic retribution.

name: Ruan Mei

attack.name: Threading Fragrance
attack.description:
[Single Target]
Deals Ice DMG equal to 50% of Ruan Mei's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: String Sings Slow Swirls
skill.description:
[Support]
After using her Skill, Ruan Mei gains Overtone, lasting for 3 turn(s). This duration decreases by 1 at the start of Ruan Mei's turn. When Ruan Mei has Overtone, all allies' DMG increases by 16% and Weakness Break Efficiency increases by 50%.

ultimate.name: Petals to Stream, Repose in Dream
ultimate.description:
[Support] | Energy Cost: 130
Ruan Mei deploys a field that lasts for 2 turns. The field's duration decreases by 1 at the start of her turn.
While inside the field, all allies' All-Type RES PEN increases by 15% and their attacks apply Thanatoplum Rebloom to the enemies hit.
When these enemies attempt to recover from Weakness Break, Thanatoplum Rebloom is triggered, extending the duration of their Weakness Break, delaying their action by an amount equal to 20% of Ruan Mei's Break Effect plus 10%, and dealing Break DMG equal to 30% of Ruan Mei's Ice Break DMG.
Enemy targets cannot have Thanatoplum Rebloom re-applied to them until they recover from Weakness Break.

talent.name: Somatotypical Helix
talent.description:
[Support]
Increases SPD by 8% for the team (excluding this character). When allies Break an enemy target's Weakness, Ruan Mei deals to this enemy target Break DMG equal to 60% of her Ice Break DMG.

technique.name: Silken Serenade
technique.description:
[Enhance]
After using the Technique, gains Silken Serenade. At the start of the next battle, automatically triggers the Skill for 1 time(s) without consuming Skill Points.
In Simulated Universe, when Ruan Mei has Silken Serenade, the team actively attacking enemies will always be regarded as attacking their Weakness to enter battle, and this attack can reduce all enemies' Toughness regardless of Weakness types. When breaking Weakness, triggers Weakness Break Effect corresponding to the attacker's Type. For every Blessing in possession up to 20 Blessing(s), additionally increases the Toughness-Reducing DMG of this attack by 100%. After breaking an enemy target's Weakness, additionally deals to the enemy target Break DMG equal to 100% of Ruan Mei's Ice Break DMG.

traces.name: Inert Respiration
traces.description: Increases Break Effect by 20% for all allies.

traces.name: Days Wane, Thoughts Wax
traces.description: Ruan Mei regenerates 5 Energy at the start of her turn.

traces.name: Candle Lights on Still Waters
traces.description: In battle, for every 10% of Ruan Mei's Break Effect that exceeds 120%, her Skill additionally increases allies' DMG by 6%, up to a maximum of 36%.
Break Effect +5.3%

e1.name: Neuronic Embroidery
e1.description: While the Ultimate's field is deployed, the DMG dealt by all allies ignores 20% of the target's DEF.

e2.name: Reedside Promenade
e2.description: With Ruan Mei on the field, all allies increase their ATK by 40% when dealing DMG to enemies with Weakness Break.

e3.name: Viridescent Pirouette
e3.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

e4.name: Chatoyant Éclat
e4.description: When an enemy target's Weakness is Broken, Ruan Mei's Break Effect increases by 100% for 3 turn(s).

e5.name: Languid Barrette
e5.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

e6.name: Sash Cascade
e6.description: Extends the duration of the Ultimate's field by 1 turn(s). The Talent's Break DMG multiplier additionally increases by 200%.

description: A member of the Genius Society and an expert in life sciences. She teamed up with Herta and the others to develop the Simulated Universe.

name: Dr. Ratio

attack.name: Mind is Might
attack.description:
[Single Target]
Deals Imaginary DMG equal to 50% of Dr. Ratio's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Intellectual Midwifery
skill.description:
[Single Target]
Deals Imaginary DMG equal to 75% of Dr. Ratio's ATK to a single target enemy.

ultimate.name: Syllogistic Paradox
ultimate.description:
[Single Target] | Energy Cost: 140
Deals Imaginary DMG equal to 144% of Dr. Ratio's ATK to a single target enemy and applies Wiseman's Folly. When Dr. Ratio's allies attack a target afflicted with Wiseman's Folly, Dr. Ratio launches his Talent's follow-up attack for 1 time against this target.
Wiseman's Folly can be triggered for up to 2 times and only affects the most recent target of Dr. Ratio's Ultimate. This trigger count resets after Dr. Ratio's Ultimate is used.

talent.name: Cogito, Ergo Sum
talent.description:
[Single Target]
When using his Skill, Dr. Ratio has a 40% fixed chance of launching a follow-up attack against his target for 1 time, dealing Imaginary DMG equal to 135% of Dr. Ratio's ATK. For each debuff the target enemy has, the fixed chance of launching follow-up attack increases by 20%. If the target enemy is defeated before the follow-up attack triggers, the follow-up attack will be directed at a single random enemy instead.

technique.name: Mold of Idolatry
technique.description:
[Impair]
After using Technique, creates a special dimension that Taunts nearby enemies, lasting for 10 second(s). After entering battle with enemies in this special dimension, there is a 100% base chance to reduce each single enemy target's SPD by 15% for 2 turn(s). Only 1 dimension created by allies can exist at the same time.

traces.name: Summation
traces.description: When Dr. Ratio uses his Skill, for every debuff on the target, his CRIT Rate increases by 2.5% and CRIT DMG by 5%. This effect can stack up to 6 time(s).

traces.name: Inference
traces.description: When Skill is used to attack an enemy target, there is a 100% base chance to reduce the attacked target's Effect RES by 10% for 2 turn(s).

traces.name: Deduction
traces.description: When dealing DMG to a target that has 3 or more debuff(s), for each debuff the target has, the DMG dealt by Dr. Ratio to this target increases by 10%, up to a maximum increase of 50%.
ATK +4%
DEF +5%
ATK +6%

e1.name: Pride Comes Before a Fall
e1.description: The maximum stackable count for the Trace "Summation" increases by 4. When a battle begins, immediately obtains 4 stacks of Summation. Needs to unlock Summation first.

e2.name: The Divine Is in the Details
e2.description: When his Talent's follow-up attack hits a target, for every debuff the target has, additionally deals Imaginary Additional DMG equal to 20% of Dr. Ratio's ATK. This effect can be triggered for a maximum of 4 time(s) during each follow-up attack.

e3.name: Know Thyself
e3.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

e4.name: Ignorance Is Blight
e4.description: When triggering the Talent, additionally regenerates 15 Energy for Dr. Ratio.

e5.name: Sic Itur Ad Astra
e5.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

e6.name: Vincit Omnia Veritas
e6.description: Increases the trigger count for Wiseman's Folly by 1. The DMG dealt by the Talent's follow-up attack increases by 50%.

description: Member of the Intelligentsia Guild. Eccentric temperament, sharp-tongued but with an elegant demeanor. The face under the strange plaster head sculpture is apparently unexpectedly handsome.

name: Xueyi

attack.name: Mara-Sunder Awl
attack.description:
[Single Target]
Deals 50% of Xueyi's ATK as Quantum DMG to a single target enemy.

skill.name: Iniquity Obliteration
skill.description:
[Blast]
Deals Quantum DMG equal to 70% of Xueyi's ATK to a single enemy, and Quantum DMG equal to 35% of Xueyi's ATK to any adjacent enemies.

ultimate.name: Divine Castigation
ultimate.description:
[Single Target] | Energy Cost: 120
Deals Quantum DMG equal to 150% of Xueyi's ATK to a single target enemy. This attack ignores Weakness Types and reduces the enemy's Toughness. When the enemy's Weakness is Broken, the Quantum DMG Break effect is triggered.
In this attack, the more Toughness is reduced, the higher the DMG will be dealt, up to a max of 36% increase.

talent.name: Karmic Perpetuation
talent.description:
[Bounce]
When Xueyi reduces enemy Toughness with attacks, Karma will be stacked. The more Toughness is reduced, the more stacks of Karma are added, up to 8 stacks.
When Xueyi's allies reduce enemy Toughness with attacks, Xueyi gains 1 stacks of Karma.
When Karma reaches the max number of stacks, consumes all current Karma stacks and immediately launches a follow-up attack against an enemy target, dealing DMG for 3 times, with each time dealing Quantum DMG equal to 45% of Xueyi's ATK to a single random enemy. This follow-up attack will not add Karma stacks.

technique.name: Summary Execution
technique.description: Immediately attacks the enemy. After entering combat, deals 80% of Xueyi's ATK as Quantum DMG to all enemies.

traces.name: Clairvoyant Loom
traces.description: Increases DMG dealt by this unit by an amount equal to 100% of Break Effect, up to a maximum DMG increase of 240%.

traces.name: Intrepid Rollerbearings
traces.description: If the enemy target's Toughness is equal to or higher than 50% of their Max Toughness, deals 10% more DMG when using Ultimate.

traces.name: Perspicacious Mainframe
traces.description: Xueyi will keep a tally of the number of Karma stacks that exceed the max stack limit, up to 6 stacks in the tally. After Xueyi's Talent is triggered, she will gain a corresponding number of tallied Karma stacks.
Break Effect +5.3%

e1.name: Dvesha, Inhibited
e1.description: Increases the DMG dealt by the Talent's follow-up attack by 40%.

e2.name: Klesha, Breached
e2.description: Talent's follow-up attack reduces enemy Toughness regardless of Weakness types. At the same time, restores Xueyi's HP by an amount equal to 5% of her Max HP. When breaking Weakness, triggers the Quantum Break Effect.

e3.name: Duḥkha, Ceased
e3.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

e4.name: Karma, Severed
e4.description: When using Ultimate, increases Break Effect by 40% for 2 turn(s).

e5.name: Deva, Enthralled
e5.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

e6.name: Saṃsāra, Mastered
e6.description: The max stack limit for Karma decreases to 6.
