description: Judge of the Ten-Lords Commission, which controls life and death on the Luofu. For years after her death, she inhabited a puppet body and returned to the world to fulfill her mission.

name: Black Swan

attack.name: Basic ATK: Percipience, Silent Dawn
attack.description:
[Single Target]
Deals Wind DMG equal to 30% of Black Swan's ATK to a single target enemy, with a 50% base chance of inflicting 1 stack of Arcana. And if the hit target currently has Wind Sheer, Bleed, Burn, or Shock applied to them, each respectively has a 50% base chance of inflicting 1 extra stack of Arcana onto the enemy.

skill.name: Decadence, False Twilight
skill.description:
[Blast]
Deals Wind DMG equal to 45% of Black Swan's ATK to a single target enemy and any adjacent targets. At the same time, there is a 100% base chance of inflicting 1 stack of Arcana on the target enemy and the adjacent targets. And there is a 100% base chance of reducing the DEF of the target enemy and the adjacent targets by 14.8%, lasting for 3 turn(s).

ultimate.name: Bliss of Otherworld's Embrace
ultimate.description:
[AoE] | Energy Cost: 120
Inflicts Epiphany on all enemies for 2 turn(s).
Enemies affected by Epiphany take 15% more DMG in their turn, and their Arcana effect is regarded as Wind Shear, Bleed, Burn, and Shock effects. In addition, when their Arcana effect is triggered at the beginning of the next turn, the Arcana stacks are not reset. The stack non-reset effect can be triggered up to 1 time(s) in Epiphany's duration, and its charges are replenished when Epiphany is applied again.
Deals Wind DMG equal to 72% of Black Swan's ATK to all enemies.

talent.name: Loom of Fate's Caprice
talent.description:
[Impair]
Every time an enemy target receives DoT at the start of each turn, there is a 50% base chance for it to be inflicted with Arcana.
While afflicted with Arcana, enemy targets receive Wind DMG equal to 96% of Black Swan's ATK at the start of each turn. Each stack of Arcana increases this DoT DMG multiplier by 4.8%. Then Arcana resets to 1 stack. Arcana can stack up to 50 times.
Only when Arcana causes DMG at the start of an enemy target's turn, Black Swan triggers additional effects based on the number of Arcana stacks inflicted on the target:
When there are 3 or more Arcana stacks, deals Wind DMG equal to 72% of Black Swan's ATK to adjacent targets, with a 50% base chance of inflicting 1 stack of Arcana on adjacent targets.
When there are 7 or more Arcana stacks, enables the current DoT dealt this time to ignore 20% of the target's and adjacent targets' DEF.

technique.name: From Façade to Vérité
technique.description:
[Enhance]
After this Technique is used, there is a 150% base chance for each enemy to be inflicted with 1 stack of Arcana at the start of the next battle. For each successful application of Arcana on a target, inflicts another stack of Arcana on the same target. This process repeats until Arcana fails to be inflicted on this target. For each successive application of Arcana on a target, its base chance of success is equal to 50% of the base chance of the previous successful infliction of Arcana on that target.

traces.name: Viscera's Disquiet
traces.description: After using the Skill to hit an enemy that has Wind Shear, Bleed, Burn, or Shock, each of these debuffs respectively has a 65% base chance of inflicting 1 extra stack of Arcana.

traces.name: Goblet's Dredges
traces.description: There is a 65% base chance to inflict 1 stack of Arcana when a target enters battle. Every time an enemy target receives DoT during a single attack by an ally, there is a 65% base chance for the target to be inflicted with 1 stack of Arcana, stacking up to 3 time(s) during 1 single attack.

traces.name: Candleflame's Portent
traces.description: Increases this unit's DMG by an amount equal to 60% of Effect Hit Rate, up to a maximum DMG increase of 72%.
ATK +4%

e1.name: Seven Pillars of Wisdom
e1.description: While Black Swan is active in battle, enemies afflicted with Wind Shear, Bleed, Burn, or Shock will have their corresponding Wind, Physical, Fire, or Lightning RES respectively reduced by 25%.

e2.name: Weep Not For Me, My Lamb
e2.description: When an enemy target afflicted with Arcana is defeated, there is a 100% base chance of inflicting 6 stack(s) of Arcana on adjacent targets.

e3.name: As Above, So Below
e3.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

e4.name: In Tears We Gift
e4.description: While in the Epiphany state, enemy targets have their Effect RES reduced by 10%. And at the start of their turn or when they get defeated, Black Swan regenerates 8 Energy. This Energy Regeneration effect can only trigger up to 1 time while Epiphany lasts. And this trigger count resets after the enemy gets inflicted with Epiphany again.

e5.name: Linnutee Flyway
e5.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

e6.name: Pantheon Merciful, Masses Pitiful
e6.description: When enemy targets get attacked by Black Swan's allies, Black Swan has a 65% base chance of inflicting 1 stack of Arcana on the target. Each time Black Swan inflicts Arcana on an enemy target, there is a 50% fixed chance to additionally increase the number of Arcana stacks afflicted this time by 1.

materials.weeklyBossMat: Past Evils of the Borehole Planet Disaster

description: A Memokeeper of the Garden of Recollection. An indolent and mysterious soothsayer. "Remembrance" of men are hers to heed, threads of fate are hers to tug.

name: Misha

attack.name: E—Excuse Me, Please!
attack.description:
[Single Target]
Deals Ice DMG equal to 50% of Misha's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: R—Room Service
skill.description:
[Blast]
Increases the Hits Per Action for Misha's next Ultimate by 1 hit(s). Deals Ice DMG equal to 100% of Misha's ATK to a single target enemy, and Ice DMG equal to 40% of Misha's ATK to adjacent targets.

ultimate.name: G—Gonna Be Late!
ultimate.description:
[Bounce] | Energy Cost: 100
Has 3 Hits Per Action by default. First, uses 1 hit to deal Ice DMG equal to 36% of Misha's ATK to a single target enemy. Then, the rest of the hits each deals Ice DMG equal to 36% of Misha's ATK to a single random enemy. Just before each hit lands, there is a 12% base chance to Freeze the target, lasting for 1 turn.
While Frozen, enemy targets cannot take any actions, and at the start of their turn, they receive Additional Ice DMG equal to 18% of Misha's ATK.
This Ultimate can possess up to 10 Hits Per Action. After the Ultimate is used, its Hits Per Action will be reset to the default level.

talent.name: Horological Escapement
talent.description:
[Enhance]
Whenever any ally consumes 1 Skill Point, Misha's next Ultimate delivers 1 more Hit(s) Per Action and Misha regenerates 1.0 Energy.

technique.name: Wait, You Are So Beautiful!
technique.description:
[Impair]
After using the Technique, creates a dimension that lasts for 15 seconds. Enemies caught in the dimension are inflicted with Dream Prison and stop all their actions. Upon entering battle against enemies afflicted with Dream Prison, increases the Hits Per Action for Misha's next Ultimate by 2 hit(s). Only 1 dimension created by allies can exist at the same time.

traces.name: Release
traces.description: Before the Ultimate's first hit lands, increases the base chance of Freezing the target by 80%.

traces.name: Interlock
traces.description: When using the Ultimate, increases the Effect Hit Rate by 60%, lasting until the end of the Ultimate's current action.

traces.name: Transmission
traces.description: When dealing DMG to Frozen enemies, increases CRIT DMG by 30%.
Ice DMG +3.2%

e1.name: Whimsicality of Fancy
e1.description: When using the Ultimate, for every enemy on the field, additionally increases the Hits Per Action for the Ultimate by 1 hit(s), up to a maximum increase of 5 hit(s).

e2.name: Yearning of Youth
e2.description: Before each hit of the Ultimate lands, there is a 24% base chance of reducing the target's DEF by 16% for 3 turn(s).

e3.name: Vestige of Happiness
e3.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

e4.name: Visage of Kinship
e4.description: Increases the DMG multiplier for each hit of the Ultimate by 6%.

e5.name: Genesis of First Love
e5.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

e6.name: Estrangement of Dream
e6.description: When using the Ultimate, increases own DMG by 30%, lasting until the end of the turn. In addition, the next time the Skill is used, recovers 1 Skill Point(s) for the team.

materials.weeklyBossMat: Past Evils of the Borehole Planet Disaster

description: A well-behaved young man serving as a hotel bellboy in Penacony. Misha has a great longing for the Nameless and dreams of one day embarking on a journey of his own.

name: Sparkle

attack.name: Monodrama
attack.description:
[Single Target]
Deals Quantum DMG equal to 50% of Sparkle's ATK to a single enemy.

skill.name: Dreamdiver
skill.description:
[Support]
Increases the CRIT DMG of a single ally by 12% of Sparkle's CRIT DMG plus 27%, lasting for 1 turn(s). And at the same time, Advances Forward this ally's action by 50%.
When Sparkle uses this ability on herself, the Action Advance effect will not trigger.

ultimate.name: The Hero with a Thousand Faces
ultimate.description:
[Support] | Energy Cost: 110
Recovers 4 Skill Points for the team and grants all allies Cipher. When allies with Cipher trigger the DMG Boost effect provided by Sparkle's Talent, each stack additionally increases its effect by 6%, lasting for 2 turns.

talent.name: Red Herring
talent.description:
[Support]
While Sparkle is on the battlefield, additionally increases the max number of Skill Points by 2. Whenever an ally consumes 1 Skill Point, all allies' DMG increases by 3%. This effect lasts for 2 turn(s) and can stack up to 3 time(s).

technique.name: Unreliable Narrator
technique.description:
[Support]
Using the Technique grants all allies Misdirect for 20 seconds. Characters with Misdirect will not be detected by enemies, and entering battle in the Misdirect state recovers 3 Skill Point(s) for the team.

traces.name: Almanac
traces.description: When using Basic ATK, additionally regenerates 10 Energy.

traces.name: Artificial Flower
traces.description: The CRIT DMG Boost effect provided by the Skill will extend to last until the start of the target's next turn.

traces.name: Nocturne
traces.description: Increases all allies' ATK by 15%. When there are 1/2/3 Quantum allies in your team, increases Quantum-Type allies' ATK by 5%/15%/30%.
HP +4%

e1.name: Suspension of Disbelief
e1.description: The Cipher effect applied by the Ultimate lasts for 1 extra turn. All allies affected by Cipher have their ATK increased by 40%.

e2.name: Purely Fictitious
e2.description: Each Talent stack allows allies to ignore 8% of the enemy target's DEF when dealing DMG to enemies.

e3.name: Pipedream
e3.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

e4.name: Life Is a Gamble
e4.description: The Ultimate recovers 1 more Skill Point. The Talent additionally increases Max Skill Points by 1.

e5.name: Parallax Truth
e5.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

e6.name: Narrative Polysemy
e6.description: The CRIT DMG Boost effect of Sparkle's Skill additionally increases by 30% of Sparkle's CRIT DMG, and when she uses her Skill, the CRIT DMG Boost effect will apply to all allies currently with Cipher. When Sparkle uses her Ultimate, this effect will spread to all allies with Cipher should the allied target have the CRIT DMG increase effect provided by the Skill active on them.

materials.weeklyBossMat: Past Evils of the Borehole Planet Disaster

description: A member of the Masked Fools. Inscrutable and unscrupulous. A dangerous maestro of theatrics, utterly engrossed in the art of performance. Adorned with innumerable masks, she is the hero with a thousand faces. Wealth, status, power... None of this matters to Sparkle. The only thing that can get her attention is "amusement."
